DOC.brief_title: EMLA Sterile Water Injections - Pain From Injections
DOC.detailed_description: Sterile Water Injection ( SWI ) previously show give good pain relief lower-back pain childbirth , chronic neck pain ureterolithiasis . However , pain associated injection remain problematic , therefore important find less painful injection technique .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Woman Age 1845 year Healthy Ability understand information instruction Pregnancy Previous experience SWI Ongoing pain Use medication depression , pain , sleep disorder 24 hour prior experiment Smoking , snuffing , physical activity , intake caffeinated beverage ( coffee , tea , energy drink ( e.g. , Red Bull ) 2 hour prior experiment
